mapper.select: SELECT c.id,c.course_id,c.user_id,c.content,c.praise,c.time,u.nickname,u.picture FROM course_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseID} ORDER BY id desc LIMIT ${size}

SELECT c.id,c.course_id,c.user_id,c.content,c.praise,c.time,u.nickname,u.picture FROM course_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseID} AND c.id < #{commentID} ORDER BY id desc LIMIT ${size}

SELECT c.id,c.course_id,c.user_id,c.content,c.praise,c.time,u.nickname,u.picture FROM course_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseID} AND c.praise > 0 ORDER BY praise desc LIMIT ${size}
mapper.update: UPDATE course_comment SET praise=praise+1 WHERE id=#{commentID}
UPDATE course_comment SET praise=praise-1 WHERE id=#{commentID}
